notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: JC, HW, YW and ST designed the study. YL and HW designed the interview guidlines. YL, HW XJ, XL and WY conducted the interviews. YL, HW, MP and CS analysed the data. YL drafted the manuscript. All authors had input on the manuscript draft. MP and ST provided valuable edits. All authors interpreted the results, revised the report and approved the final version.
